name: Pac-Hack plus
description:
Pac-Hack,  my mod of Atarisoft's Pac-man was recently named as the winner in The Spectrum Show's Pacman shootout. To celebrate I am happy to release the plus version which includes the side panel artwork. This was previously only available to my supporters on Patreon, but is now completely free.

A smoother version of Pac-man is still very much in my plans for the future so watch this space!
